```{r setup}

#| message: false


library(readxl); library(tidyverse); library(gt)
lac_data <- read_excel("data/lac_data.xlsx", na = "NA")



lac_data %>%
  filter(time == "pre") %>%
  select(FP, sex, age, weight, height) %>%
  group_by(sex) %>%
  summarise(MeanAge = mean(age),
            sdAge = sprintf("(%.2f)", sd(age)),
            MeanHeight = mean(height),
            sdHeight = sprintf("(%.2f)", sd(height)),
            MeanWeight = mean(weight),
            sdWeight = sprintf("(%.2f)", sd(weight)), n = n()) %>%
  gt(caption = "Subjects") %>%
  cols_label(MeanAge = "Age",
             sdAge = "",
             MeanHeight = "Height",
             sdHeight = "",
             MeanWeight = "Weight",
             sdWeight = "",
             n = "Participants",
             sex = "Sex") 
```
